property.name: directly.accept.html.regex
property.description: the rules is like this: selector11[@nodename];selector12[@nodename]...;;selector21[@nodename];selector22[@nodename].... the way of the selector use can look at the http://jsoup.org/cookbook/extracting-data/selector-syntax. And if you want to get the attribute of the node, you can make the selector like this: selector::attribute1 attribute2.... Lastly, the nodename is a choice, if you don't rename the node, the default name of this node is selector.
